AI Description: Python is a high-level, interpreted programming language known for its simplicity and readability. It supports multiple programming paradigms and has a vast ecosystem of libraries and frameworks.
Core Features:
1. Easy-to-learn syntax
2. Interpreted nature
3. Dynamic typing
4. Extensive standard library
5. Supports object-oriented, imperative, functional, and procedural programming
6. Cross-platform compatibility
7. Large community support
8. Extensible and customizable
9. Used for web development, data analysis, artificial intelligence, automation, and more.
General Tags: Programming Language, Interpreted Language, High-Level Language
Research Field: Computer & Information Sciences, Software Engineering, Systems, & Development
